channel.title: Portals [PI]
channel.description: What file do I control where portals spawn and teleport you to? I looked in client.java (source) and there was nothing, same with ObjectManager.java, there are portals in the donatorzone so I know there are already portals added.

item.title: Portals [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“GetaofDX, post:5, topic:504060”]No it’s in actionhandler.java

src/server/model/players/actionhandler.java[/quote]
This^
Actionhandler.java under firstClickObject method to change where the portal teleports you. You’ll find it via object ID.
If you want to move the portal itself, change it in ObjectManager.java

Read full topic

item.title: Portals [PI]
item.dc:creator: @GetaofDX GetaofDX
item.description:
@GetaofDX wrote:

No it’s in actionhandler.java

src/server/model/players/actionhandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Portals [PI]
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Well, add the objectID, X coordinate, Y coordinate, the Height, the way it should face and the objectType in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

// objectId X Y H Face objectType //object = 9981 2919 5274 0 -1 10 [ENDOFOBJECTLIST]
That’s all I have in there though, there are already three portals.

Read full topic

item.title: Portals [PI]
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Objects.cfg (or global-objects.cfg) is where you need to add them with your coordinates.

Read full topic
